title: This game, is cancer.
body:
Rito make this champ better please! rito WHY did u make this champ op!! Rito PEOPLE ARE SAYING GG EZ and  itts offending mee! 

who the fuck says shit like this, and by the way i just you can get banned for just simply saying a swear.. this game is starting to get comical as to bans and raging and toxic and cancer.. if anything someone saying that a kid is cancer should be worse than a punishment as to saying fuck you to someone fuck this game tho
